items.text: full outside off, drilled to mid-off
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: swept to short fine leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: there's the wicket. Crucial breakthrough for WI. Tamim advances down the ground but Bishoo has flattened his trajectory and pushed it across Tamim who can't get anywhere close to it. Loses balance as he reaches out and the keeper does the rest
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, OUT

dismissal.text: Tamim Iqbal st †Hope b Bishoo 54 (85b 6x4 0x6) SR: 63.52

items.text: full on middle and off, defended
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Prasun: "I agree that Tamim has matured himself to become one of the best players. But I'm afraid nobody, including Tamim, has learned much from Sakib or Mushi, who keeps the scoreboard running without hitting big shots. Man, you've to sneak out the singles, rotate the strikes and release the pressure from (for God's sake) the viewers!"
items.text: length, shuffles and blocks outside off
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Andrew : "Finally they bowled Bikachu and he delivers!"
items.text: extremely full, sneaks under the bat as he tries to squeeze it out
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven to deep point
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: shuffles across to a length ball and blocks
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: floated up around leg stump and spinning away to hit the pad. Appeal withheld, pitching outside leg perhaps
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, swept uppishly to deep square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: spins into the pads and strikes them. Missing leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short, cut late through point for a brace. Fifty for Shakib
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: one ball after the fifty, he's gone. These two are Bangladesh's seniormost batsmen. They contemplate reviewing it, and Shakib goes for it. Pitching outside off and spinning in to hit the pad as Shakib looks to loosely flick it. Oh, missing. Would you believe it? It's turned so much that's spun past leg from outside off. Great, great review
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: are West Indies claiming a catch here? Yes, they are. Soft signal is out but the umpires converge and send this upstairs. Advances down the ground looking to cart it through the off side and gets an inside edge that bounces just next to his shoe, hits the pad and lobs to midwicket who dives forward and takes a catch
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: worked away to third man
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on middle and leg, driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, drilled to the left of the bowler
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Atiq: "Run rate is now near 5. Required rate is increasing exponetially. BD is in already trouble. But you know as a BD fan we are used to see BD throw out the match away so many times. Hope this time see something different."
items.text: jams this dipping delivery into the pads
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: fullish length outside off, shovelled through cow corner, one-bounce over
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: gets down to sweep and misses as the ball's shorter than he'd have liked and goes over. WI appeal for a stumping. The backfoot has come out. He slides it back in time
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: comes forward and then gets down and sweeps to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: floated up on middle, driven out through cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
